channel.title: BM is still a hoax
channel.description:
When I ask the devs to prove this mod even exists they give us this (and stuff like this): [url]https://www.youtube.com/user/BlackMesaSourceMedia#p/u/0/wuJ1siA-Yq8[/url]
Ohh yea, proof positive!! Phht, give me a break. After six years this is the best proof you can come up with that this mod ever made it out of the conceptual stage. Yea right! Hell, I could probably make that if i played with the dev software for a couple days.
I think the "demo trailer" was someones job interview portfolio project. Simply to show off some skills, nothing more.
Hey Dev's: "prove me wrong!"
Here is a thought, why dont you show a video of an actual level!!
Sorry for the rant but hey I THINK ITS A HOAX!!
